name: lightweightadventur.es
description: For simplicity lovers with a thirst for adventure and freedom

scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:deps
scripts.build:assets: rsync assets/* .build & cp -r assets/img .build/assets/img & cp -r assets/webfonts .build/assets/webfonts
scripts.watch:css: onchange assets/scss/*.scss assets/scss/**/*.scss -- npm run build:css
scripts.watch:js: onchange assets/js/*.js assets/js/**/*.js -- npm run build:js
scripts.dev: npm run open:dev & parallelshell 'npm run livereload' 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch'

author: Adam Tait
